name: Mad Max Name Generator
description: Witness! Your descent into the Fury Road starts now! Crave a moniker worthy of the Wasteland? This generator will forge you a name as brutal and iconic as Immortan Joe himself. Get ready to become a legend, chrome-plated and ready for anything.
introduction: In the grim darkness of a post-apocalyptic future, names matter. They're your identity, your reputation, and sometimes, your only currency. This Mad Max Name Generator will arm you with a wasteland-worthy title, perfect for surviving the Fury Road, leading a war party, or just looking incredibly badass. So buckle up, buttercup, and let's get you named!
howToUse: First, steel your resolve. The Wasteland isn't for the faint of heart!
Click the 'Generate' button. (It's the one that doesn't explode.)
Behold! Your new, chrome-plated Mad Max name appears!
Don't like it? Hit 'Generate' again! We've got more names than Immortan Joe has war boys. (Okay, maybe not *that* many, but still... a lot!)
Share your epic name with the world (or just your friends online). Just try not to start any wars over it. Unless, you know, that's your thing.

faqs.question: Is this generator actually related to the Mad Max franchise?
faqs.answer: We're huge fans! While not officially endorsed, we've poured our love for the saga into creating names that feel right at home in the Wasteland.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my Mad Max-themed character?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! That's exactly what it's for. Go forth and conquer (or at least survive)!

faqs.question: Are the names generated completely random?
faqs.answer: Yes and no. We use a carefully curated list of prefixes and suffixes designed to evoke the gritty, brutal feel of the Mad Max universe. So while the combinations are random, the vibe is always Wasteland-approved.

faqs.question: Will I become a better driver if I use a Mad Max name?
faqs.answer: We can't guarantee improved driving skills, but you'll definitely *feel* like you can take on a convoy of War Boys. (Please don't actually do that.)

faqs.question: I generated a name I really like! Can I save it?
faqs.answer: While this generator doesn't have a built-in save function, you can always copy and paste your favorite names into a document or note. That way, they're yours forever... or at least until the digital apocalypse.

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the names I generate?
faqs.answer: Keep hitting that 'Generate' button! With enough tries, you're bound to find a name that resonates with your inner Furiosa. And hey, even in the Wasteland, persistence pays off.
